title: CNN 10 - April 20, 2020
maintext:
Story highlights This page includes the show Transcript
April 20, 2020
Open or closed? That is the debate taking place across the United States, as different governments consider when to lift their restrictions. We're taking you to South Korea to see how it's identifying and tracking coronavirus patients, though the technology comes at the cost of privacy. And we're showing you how a CNN Hero's organization of veterans is once again answering the call to serve.
TRANSCRIPT
CNN 10 serves a growing audience interested in compact on-demand news broadcasts ideal for explanation seekers on the go or in the classroom. The show's priority is to identify stories of international significance and then clearly describe why they're making news, who is affected, and how the events fit into a complex, international society.
